docs.text: Metric Registry This catalog is generated from the Stage 6 transparency pipeline. Each metric links to a badge report and reproducibility evidence. Use onchain-metrics show <metric> --date YYYY-MM-DD to inspect the exact upstream records contributing to any metric value. Append --json for machine-readable output. docs.title: Metric Registry

docs.text: Adjusted Cdd Definition Coin Days Destroyed normalized by spent volume for the metric date. Formula Adjusted CDD = CDD / spent_value_btc. QA Badge Field Value Status verified Version 1.0.0 Coverage % 99.50 Null Ratio 0.0010 Deflated Sharpe 0.00 Golden Checks Passed True No Lookahead True Reproducible True Provenance UTXO snapshot commit: utxo-spent@0000000 Price root commit: price-oracle@0000000 Formulas version: metrics-formulas@v0.1.0 Known Caveats Pending deeper statistical audit for extreme market regimes. Reproduction SELECT date, adjusted_cdd FROM read_parquet('data/metrics/daily/metrics.parquet') WHERE date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-01-10'; Golden Day Snapshot Capture the golden day chart or table and store it at images/adjusted_cdd_golden.png to replace this note. Citations Onchain Lab Stage 4 Metrics Specification

docs.text: Asopr Definition Adjusted SOPR excluding UTXOs with holding period under one day. Formula aSOPR = adjusted_realized_value / adjusted_cost_basis for spends held ≥ 1 hour. docs.text: Cdd Definition Coin Days Destroyed aggregated for spends on the metric date. Formula CDD = Σ (value_btc × holding_days) for all spends on the metric date. Citations ByteTree, "Coin Days Destroyed"

docs.text: Dormancy Flow Definition Dormancy flow calculated as market capitalization divided by rolling Coin Days Destroyed. Formula Dormancy Flow = market_value_usd / rolling_mean(CDD). docs.text: Drawdown Pct Definition Percentage drawdown from trailing price maximum. Formula Drawdown % = (price_close − rolling_max(price_close)) / rolling_max(price_close). docs.text: Mvrv Zscore Definition Z-score of market minus realized value over trailing window. Formula MVRV Z-Score = (market_value_usd − supply_cost_basis_usd − rolling_mean) / rolling_std. Citations LookIntoBitcoin, "MVRV Z-Score"

docs.text: Realized Loss Usd Definition Aggregated realized losses (absolute value of negative profits) for the metric date. Formula realized_loss_usd = Σ abs(min(realized_value_usd − cost_basis_usd, 0)) over daily spends. docs.text: Realized Value Usd Definition Total realized capitalization derived from cost basis of current UTXO set. Formula realized_value_usd = Σ cost_basis_usd across all unspent outputs. QA Badge Field Value Status verified Version 1.0.0 Coverage % 100.00 Null Ratio 0.0000 Deflated Sharpe 0.00 Golden Checks Passed True No Lookahead True Reproducible True Provenance UTXO snapshot commit: utxo-snapshots@0000000 Price root commit: price-oracle@0000000 Formulas version: metrics-formulas@v0.1.0 Known Caveats Pending deeper statistical audit for extreme market regimes. Reproduction SELECT date, realized_value_usd FROM read_parquet('data/metrics/daily/metrics.parquet') WHERE date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-01-10'; Golden Day Snapshot Capture the golden day chart or table and store it at images/realized_value_usd_golden.png to replace this note. Citations Onchain Lab Stage 4 Metrics Specification

docs.text: Sopr Definition Spent Output Profit Ratio computed as realized value divided by cost basis for the day. Formula SOPR = realized_value_usd / cost_basis_spent_usd (spent outputs). QA Badge Field Value Status verified Version 1.0.0 Coverage % 99.50 Null Ratio 0.0000 Deflated Sharpe 0.43 Golden Checks Passed True No Lookahead True Reproducible True Provenance UTXO snapshot commit: utxo-spent@0000000 Price root commit: price-oracle@0000000 Formulas version: metrics-formulas@v0.1.0 Known Caveats Pending deeper statistical audit for extreme market regimes. Reproduction SELECT date, sopr FROM read_parquet('data/metrics/daily/metrics.parquet') WHERE date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-01-10'; Golden Day Snapshot Capture the golden day chart or table and store it at images/sopr_golden.png to replace this note. Citations Willy Woo, "On-chain metrics: SOPR" (2019) Glassnode Academy, "Spent Output Profit Ratio"

docs.text: Utxo Profit Share Definition Share of outstanding supply currently in profit relative to cost basis. Formula UTXO Profit Share = share of outstanding supply with cost_basis < price_close. QA Badge Field Value Status verified Version 1.0.0 Coverage % 100.00 Null Ratio 0.0000 Deflated Sharpe 0.21 Golden Checks Passed True No Lookahead True Reproducible True Provenance UTXO snapshot commit: utxo-snapshots@0000000 Price root commit: price-oracle@0000000 Formulas version: metrics-formulas@v0.1.0 Known Caveats Pending deeper statistical audit for extreme market regimes.
